Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by a mortgage on real property in Albany County
Summary: Extends the authorization to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by a mortgage on real property in Albany County.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 405 of the laws of 2005 amending the tax law relating to authorizing the county of Albany to impose a county recording tax on obligations secured by a mortgage on real property, in relation to extending the effectiveness thereof
